channel.title: Manually trigger alerts for testing webhooks
channel.description:
I want to manually trigger an alert to test a webhook.
Is there such an option?

item.title: Manually trigger alerts for testing webhooks
item.dc:creator: cindyforcia
item.description:
If you are using Redash V9, then you should read this Redash user guide https://redash.io/help/user-guide/alerts/setting-up-an-alert. Hopefully, it answers your question.

Read full topic
item.source: Manually trigger alerts for testing webhooks
